name: COMBOCUBE
description:
CONTROLS:
A - MOVE LEFT
D - MOVE RIGHT
W - JUMP
S - FASTFALL (WHEN MIDAIR)
ARROW KEYS TO SHOOT & MENU NAVIGATION IN SHOPS (SHOOTING DOWN GIVES A BOOST)
SPACEBAR FOR ACTIVE ITEMS
E FOR INTERACT AND BUYING IN SHOPS
ESC TO PAUSE
MOUSE IS USED IN MENUS

NOTE: IF THE GAME STOPS TAKING INPUTS AFTER RESTARTING PRESS ESCAPE, I DIDNT SET A RESUME FLAG AND I DONT WANNA MAKE ANOTHER BUILD FOR THAT SINCE ITS 4 HOURS BEFORE MY FLIGHT AND I NEED SOME SLEEP

ALL AUDIO IS WIP
